mapper.select: select t.* from (select s.product_id, s.product_costprice, s.product_amount, product_expectedamount, s.stock_updateday, s.stock_no , rank()over (partition by s.product_id order by s.stock_no desc) as stock_rank from stock s ) t where t.stock_rank=1 and product_id=#{product_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Stock (product_costprice, product_amount, product_id, stock_updateday, stock_no) VALUES (#{product_costprice}, #{product_amount}, #{product_id}, SYSDATE, stock_seq.NEXTVAL)
mapper.update: MERGE INTO stock USING dual ON product_id = #{product_id} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT INTO Stock (product_costprice, product_amount, product_id, stock_updateday, stock_no) VALUES (#{product_costprice}, #{product_amount}, #{product_id}, SYSDATE, stock_seq.NEXTVAL) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET product_amount = product_amount + #{product_amount}
